channel.title: Login and Register button not right working?
channel.description: Everything works beside the login and register button. When i type my data WRONG in the fields (username, password, Key/license) It still sends me to the main.cs form. No message box. Nothing. I can type whatever i want like 23123e 232e24qd 231q23e and it still sends me there. How can i fix this? And i would like to add a message box. I hope you can help me!

item.title: Login and Register button not right working?
item.dc:creator: ItsEnes
item.description:
Login and register Code:

private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
KeyAuthApp.login(username.Text, password.Text);
if (KeyAuthApp.response.success)
{
Main main = new Main();
main.Show();
this.Hide();
}
}

    private void button2_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
    {
        KeyAuthApp.register(username.Text, password.Text, key.Text);
        if (KeyAuthApp.response.success)
        {
            Main main = new Main();
            main.Show();
            this.Hide();
        }
    }
}

}

Read full topic
